CustomField.description: [DrawLoop]: Used in WF Outbound Message [Task 11630] DDP = License Face Certificate ; Delivery = SMTP - ODJFS COL Approved & SMTP - ODE COL Approved
CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.Name , "Amendment - FCC - Change of Location", "SFCLQ_Program_Transaction__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a0335000002RUf0;Deploy:a0135000000kgnB", "Amendment - Center - Change of Location", "SFCLQ_Program_Transaction__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a0335000002RUf0;Deploy:a0135000000kgnB", "Amendment - ODE - Change of Location", "SFCLQ_Program_Transaction__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a0335000002RUf0;Deploy:a0135000000kgn1", "")
CustomField.label: Drawloop_Next COL Approved
